alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 22 at 4:39PM CDT until March 22 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Lamar and Pickens. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 438 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow moving thunderstorms. This will cause flooding of low lying areas, creeks and streams. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vernon, Sulligent, Millport, Pickensville, Ethelsville, Bedford, Lamar County Airport, Melborne, Star, Shaw, Forest, Hightogy, Macedonia and Lamar County Public Lake.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
